1.verse: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, now may Israel say;

2.verse: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, when men rose up against us:

3.verse: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:

4.verse: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:

5.verse: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.

6.verse: Blessed be the LORD, who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.

7.verse: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.

8.verse: Our help is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
